project.name: Snake 1.4
project.notes: Classic snake game Play by pressing the spacebar, move by using arrow keys or WASD, Activate AI by pressing M (in development, may not work). Changelog: 1.1 Added Sounds, 1.2 Moved music to its own sprite and added WASD control, 1.3 Added pause and stop and a highscore bar, 1.4 Added AI (still in development).
